title: R3BIRTH Unit Live and Fan Meeting Day 2! And Then....
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>It’s finally going to start, R3BIRTH’s live!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I can’t wait for it. Rina-chan’s board「Restless」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>You know~, when Kasumin was messaging Shioko earlier, she said that they had a review of mistakes and choreography after yesterday’s live. Are they going to be okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Hmm~, even if Mia-chan has built up quite the stamina.... maybe yesterday was too much for her.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Lanzhu-senpai too. It’s frustrating, but she had a really powerful performance. She said she’s going to show us an even better one today, but no matter how great Lanzhu-senpai is, isn’t she also tired?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>....While I am worried, I have a feeling that R3BIRTH will be fine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Well, if they’re not, then this is the end for them. It just means that they’re not ready to be my rival~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Fufu, we’ll also have R3BIRTH’s celebration party and your birthday party after the live. That’ll be fun.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh!? My birthday party!?!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Ah.... I was supposed to keep it a secret.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
